Name: Canteen Martini
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
45 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Tangy, sweet and sour - Southern Comfort drinkers will love this.
History: Originally created by Joey Guerra at Canteen, New York City, and adapted by author and columnist Gary Regan.
Nutrition: One serving of Canteen Martini contains 264 calories
